main event: A sergeant in the Civil Air Patrol observed a circular UFO over Wright-Patterson Air Force Base in Ohio on July 25, 1954.
interesting points: The UFO was the size of a full moon and had a silver-white color with a black center.,It traveled from the zenith to the northwest direction for about 10 degrees before disappearing.,The object left a trail that resembled a jet vapor trail in the daytime.,The observation lasted for only 5 seconds.,The witness was a 16-year-old sergeant participating in a CAP encampment.
sighted object: circular UFO with silver-white color and black center
witness description: 16-year-old sergeant in the Civil Air Patrol
